title: "Class 6: HCRIS Data"
date: 2025-01-30
---

In this class, we'll discuss the Hospital Cost Report Information System (HCRIS) data and how to use these data to estimate hospital prices.

## Objectives

- Understand the nature of hospital pricing
- Explain HCRIS data, how the data are generated, and how the data can be used to estimate a hospital's "price"

## Activities 

- Clone the [Hospital Cost Report Information System (HCRIS)](https://github.com/imccart/hcris-class) repository for this class and begin working with data. See also a similar repository [here](https://github.com/asacarny/hospital-cost-reports) from [Adam Sacarny](http://sacarny.com/)
